description:
Sr. Manager - Customer Onboarding

Location: Remote

Experience: 12+ Years

Mandatory Skills / Required Experience:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Healthcare Management, or a related field; Master’s degree preferred.
  • 15+ years of experience in a leadership role, with a focus on strategic initiatives, process standardization, and cross-functional collaboration.
  • Extensive experience in the healthcare or health plans industry, with a deep understanding of customer onboarding, whole person management, and third-party interactions.
  • Strong leadership and communication skills, with the ability to influence and engage stakeholders at all levels of the organization.
  • Experience in change management, with a focus on driving organizational change and ensuring successful adoption of new processes.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with a focus on data-driven decision-making.

Educational Qualifications:

Engineering Degree – BE/ME/BTech/MTech/BSc/MSc.

Technical certification in multiple technologies is desirable.

What is in it for you?

As a Sr. Manager - Customer Onboarding, you will be a part of an Agile team to provide leadership support for the customer onboarding processes across the organization.

Responsibilities:

  • Provide leadership support in engaging Sales, Marketing, and Operations teams to align on strategic goals and initiatives.
  • Lead the development and execution of strategies to streamline and standardize customer onboarding processes across the organization.
  • Oversee the implementation of whole person non-digital management practices, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and customer needs.
  • Drive the standardization of processes related to customer onboarding, ensuring consistency and efficiency across all teams and departments.
  • Collaborate with key stakeholders to identify opportunities for process improvement and implement best practices.
  • Ensure that third-party interactions are streamlined and standardized, enhancing overall operational efficiency and customer experience.
  • Work closely with Sales, Marketing, and Operations teams to ensure alignment on strategic initiatives and process improvements.
  • Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to integrate whole person management practices into existing processes.
  • Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of whole person management initiatives, making adjustments as needed to ensure success.
  • Lead efforts to streamline and standardize interactions with third-party vendors and partners, ensuring alignment with organizational goals.
  • Develop and implement strategies to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of third-party interactions, reducing complexity and improving outcomes.
  • Manage relationships with key third-party stakeholders, ensuring successful collaboration and alignment on objectives.
  • Drive change management initiatives to support the implementation of standardized processes and strategic initiatives across the organization.
